projects.title: Dev Portfolio
projects.bodyText:
- Developer Portfolio Website made in React
 - Dark Mode Support

projects.title: Reading Aid for the Blind (RAB) App
projects.bodyText: - An Android App that aids the visually impaired to read text in printed font.

projects.title: Interactive Video Quiz Application
projects.bodyText:
- An interactive video quiz web application that engages users with questions during video playback.
 - Utilizes YouTube Iframe API for video integration and Firestore database for data storage.
